name: iZombie Season 3
info:
• 中文名: 我是僵尸 第三季
  • 放送星期: 2
  • 别名: 尸家妙探
  • 集数: 13
  • 开始: 2017-04-04
  • 类型: ZomComRomDram/剧情/丧尸/僵尸/罪案/喜剧/
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 每集长: 42min
  • 电视台: CW

eps.name: Heaven Just Got a Little Bit Smoother
eps.desc: Liv has discovered there are more zombies living in Seattle than she previously believed. In fact, there's a private military contractor employing a small zombie army, and that army is preparing for the day humans learn of their existence. Major was exonerated for the crimes of the Chaos Killer, but is still considered a pariah. He manages to land a job with the one and only place that will hire him. Meanwhile, Blaine is accused of lying.

eps.name: Zombie Knows Best
eps.desc: When Liv, Clive and Ravi arrive at the scene to investigate a fatal car accident, they begin to suspect foul play was involved. Both starving, Liv and Major consume the brains of the accident victims, a well-meaning father and his angsty teenage daughter. Meanwhile, when Clive is brought in for questioning about a family that was murdered, he’s forced to reveal his past history with them. Lastly, Peyton extends an olive branch to Ravi, and Major hits a road block in his search for Natalie (guest star Brooke Lyons “The Affair”). David Anders also stars.

eps.name: Eat, Pray, Liv
eps.desc: To help Clive solve the murder of a lifestyle guru, Liv consumes his brain and takes on his zen approach to life. Ravi's old boss, Katty Kupps (guest star Christina Cox, "Arrow"), is getting closer to discovering the truth while also getting closer to Ravi. Meanwhile, Blaine and Peyton continue their budding friendship, much to Ravi's dismay. Lastly, Major is struggling a bit at his new job.

eps.name: Wag the Tongue Slowly
eps.desc: Clive’s patience is tested when Liv consumes the brain of a murder victim who had the reputation of being the ultimate office gossip. Meanwhile, Blaine and Peyton continue to grow closer as they wait to see if Ravi is able to reverse the effects of the cure. Lastly, Major is one step away from fulfilling a promise.

eps.name: Spanking the Zombie
eps.desc: Liv eats brains and takes on the traits of a Dominatrix

eps.name: Eat a Knievel
eps.desc:
iZombie 3x08 "Eat a Knievel" Season 3 Episode 8 
Liv (Rose McIver) shares the brain of a former daredevil with her new boyfriend, and the experience brings them closer. Blaine (David Anders) is back to his old ways. Meanwhile, Ravi (Rahul Kohli) makes progress in his new research. Finally, a discovery is made that could put Major (Robert Buckley) in grave danger. Aly Michalka and Malcolm Goodwin also star. Michael Wale directed the episode written by John Bellina (#308). Original airdate 5/23/2017. Subscribe to tvpromosdb on Youtube for more iZombie season 3 promos in HD!

eps.name: Twenty-Sided, Die
eps.desc: LIV IS THE DUNGEON MASTER — When a Dungeon Master is killed, Liv and Clive discover he was up to more than just playing in his basement. Meanwhile, Blaine’s experiment does not go as planned. Lastly, Ravi finds stumbles across some new information that could prove deadly.

eps.name: Return of the Dead Guy
eps.desc: Peyton and Liv find themselves on a surprising wild goose chase. Ravi is terrified when the zombie truth hunters' plans are revealed. Elsewhere, Major finds comfort in an unexpected - and perhaps unwelcome - friend. Malcolm Goodwin and David Anders also star.

eps.name: Conspiracy Weary
eps.desc: iZombie 3x11 "Conspiracy Weary" Season 3 Episode 11 Extended Promo - Liv (Rose McIver) and Blaine (David Anders) come to the rescue of one of their own. They consume the brains of a conspiracy theorist and paranoia ensues. Meanwhile, as they continue to search for conspiracy theories that may or may not exist, Liv researches Major’s (Robert Buckley) new friend. Finally, Ravi (Rahul Kohli) makes a surprising discovery of his own. Malcolm Goodwin and Aly Michalka also star. The episode was written by Bob Dearden and Directed by Mark Piznarski (#311).

eps.name: Looking for Mr. Goodbrain, Part 1
eps.desc: Zombie 3x12 "Looking for Mr. Goodbrain, Part 1" Season 3 Episode 12 Sneak Peek - When Liv (Rose McIver) consumes the brains of someone from Ravi's (Rahul Kohli) past, not only does it have her wanting to sleep with every guy in Seattle, she also begins having some very intimate visions of Ravi. Meanwhile, Major (Robert Buckley) is faced with a huge decision. Malcolm Goodwin, David Anders and Aly Michalka also star.
